item.title: SeaChat Release History
item.description: 11/21/2024 # New Features and Improvements # Preferred and Enforced Response Languages: Users can now specify the language SeaChat should use in responses. With the preferred response language setting, SeaChat detects the user’s language and responds accordingly, defaulting to the selected language if it cannot determine the user’s language. With the enforced response language setting, SeaChat consistently responds in the selected language regardless of the user’s input. Hybrid Conversation Handling Mode: In Hybrid mode, users can now configure whether to allow customers to proactively request a live agent.
